Review.Contenu: Paid extra around 8$ more for a mint steelbook and was sent one with rips throughout the plastic and visible dent, jammed in a tight protector. Kept it since returning and everything is a hassle.
Never got the code for the movie even though it was out on digital already.

Ugh, this guy. Not very friendly, acts super entitled like we’re lucky to be buying stuff from him. Took over a month to ship my order and I literally had to check in new remind him multiple times. Arrived with a small dent and was basically told “oh well”. Actual date of experience may not be accurate as it was a while ago and I just received this request to complete a review like a year later and clearly have not returned as a customer, which I think says everything you need to know! He’s also “heral-jess” or something on eBay and you’ll get the same attitude there. Avoid.

Way overpriced, increíbly slow shipping, terrible communication.  I once sent them a list of my wants and got a reply 2 weeks after saying to check the website cause they didn't have time to manually see if they have them or the prices.  Most of the ones I wanted said "contact for price/stock" or similar.  Another time I placed an order that took 3 weeks to ship and it was incomplete and one slip was the wrong version.  Will never buy or even consider buying from them again.  I guess the guy who runs this doesn't have the time or care too much.

This review is in reference to an experience with this company on November 11th 2022. I received a review request via email on an order placed more than 4 years ago. As this was not a recent experience, I am reviewing my most recent experience with this company. A random email more than 4 years later is hardly a positive experience and borderlines on Spam.

Review.Titre: THIS GUY CLIFF LOKER IS A CROOK!
Review.Contenu: THIS GUY CLIFF LOKER IS A CROOK!! BUYERS BEWARE!! I will be posting this on multiple blu-ray forums to warn other buyers…he DEFRAUDED me!! I sent him movies in for trade in and Cliff took the movies and refuses to issue the store credit!! I even contacted the local police in his city! He is a FRAUD and an outright CROOK!!! BEWARE!!!

Review.Titre: AVOID ORDERING HERE AT ALL COSTS!
Review.Contenu: This is a totally shady business run by a single greedy seller named Cliff Loker. He puts limits on the "HOT" items but doesn't indicate anywhere on his site that there is a limit of one item per customer, and that is absolutely unfair and confusing and frustrating to customers. I ordered 3 copies of a steelbook from him because I ended up missing out on ordering them from Best Buy, where I always order from. I chose Priority Small Box as the shipping option because that was the lowest price option available. Had he bothered to inform me that there was a limit, I could have saved money by just ordering the one copy and choosing regular mail or media mail to ship. And he already collects payment as soon as the order is placed, so I was charged for all 3 steelbooks and I was obviously upset when I received only 1. I had to call him in order to find out what happened. Luckily, he refunded me for the steelbooks he never sent but he still never bothered to notify me about the situation after the order was placed. This guy Cliff is a total scammer and bait-and-switcher and he definitely made some money off me. This was my first experience ordering from him but I will definitely not be doing so again and I encourage everyone else who is a serious collector like me to avoid buying from him at all costs!
Ordered a Blu-ray slip case. Wouldn't ship unless I paid a ridiculous amount for shipping. Order cancelled.
Received the wrong movie. I ordered resovoir dogs 4k and got The inhabitant DVD instead.
Order not fulfilled. Had to have the charge reversed by credit card company
Communicating with Cliff is not a pleasant experience. He's extremely rude and seems to have zero interest of helping his customers.

Review.Titre: Everything I wanted was not in stock…
Review.Contenu: Everything I wanted was not in stock and got no help from anyone.

Review.Titre: Don’t charge us so much for shipping

Review.Contenu: Outrageously expensive shipping costs for items that weigh literally nothing.

Review.Titre: Great selection of hard to find titles.
Review.Contenu: Great selection of hard to find titles.Insanely overpriced however, and the shipping to Canada makes it a last resort. He claims that pricing is based on demand, but as a re-seller it’s up to his own discretion and he chooses to gouge.

Review.Titre: Purchases are made here out of desperation
Review.Contenu: Great selection of hard to find titles. Insanely overpriced however, and the shipping to Canada makes it a last resort. He claims that pricing is based on demand, but as a re-seller it’s up to his own discretion and he chooses to gouge.

The products are great, the prices are fair. Items are packaged well for shipping... I wish I could give higher rating but shipping can be SO SLOW. Ridiculously slow at times.... and that is very frustrating. It should not take as long as it does. That's the only reason I can't give this site a perfect score. Still, this is a really great place to buy from if you don't mind waiting 1-2 months to get what you ordered.
I like the selection of movies and slipcovers. I dislike the shipping speed.

As a dedicated movie enthusiast, Blurays For Everyone has been my go-to destination for quality 4K titles and exclusive SteelBooks. The extensive collection, including customs-friendly options, ensures that I find the movies I desire. The customer service is commendable; they actively assist in sourcing specific items, such as slip covers, even if not listed on the website.The exclusive 4K SteelBooks, like "The Mandalorian" and "WandaVision," showcase a commitment to offering unique and sought-after editions. The user-friendly interface and responsiveness to customer feedback contribute to an enjoyable shopping experience.Whether it's iconic classics or the latest releases, Blurays For Everyone caters to diverse preferences. The availability of limited editions and exclusives, like the XL Full Slip SteelBook for "The Exorcist," adds a touch of rarity to my collection.Overall, Blurays For Everyone is more than a store; it's a haven for movie collectors seeking quality, exclusivity, and exceptional customer service.

Review.Titre: If you want Blurays with SlipCovers ...
Review.Contenu: If you want Blurays with (special) Slipcovers (guaranteed - e.g. as collector's item) you have to visit the website of 'Blurays For Everyone'. Yes - the disks arrived in mint condition and were safely packaged. But - order date was May 14th, arrival date July 11th ! Furthermore, customs charged me 1.12 € tax (that's ok ...) and 6 € flat fee because of 'Goods not fulfilling the conditions laid down in Article 28 and 29 of the Treaty on the functioning of the European Union' - meaning the seller should have paid the sales tax / VAT in advance. In the good old times (before July 2021) taxes below 5 € haven't been collected (if the value of the attached customs declaration was accepted ...😃) and there was no delay in your order. Nowadays 'they' try to scrape up every single $ or € 'they' can get 😡 to balance the government deficit ...Nevertheless - the overall experience was positive and I would buy again.

Review.Titre: Reliable. But be cautious with import fees...
Review.Contenu: This website is reliable for ordering rare or otherwise unfindable blurays. The goods came from US to France in about ten days after ordering, and were adequately packed.However, be cautious when ordering from abroad because of elevated import fees. By default UPS may charge you as much as 38€ import fees for a 20€ bluray! These 38€ decomposes into 5€ of mandatory import taxes (depending on the country you live in) which you cannot avoid. Yet, the rest is only vaguely referred to as "processing fees" by UPS and is basically no more than racketing!In some country though - such as Canada, for instance - you can ask UPS to deal with the custom by yourself. In such a case, you only have to fill-in a paper for the local custom and pay the ~5€. However, in other countries - such as France - you cannot do that and are you are forced to submit to the transporter's racketing and pay whatever they want...

The product was as described. The packaging was thorough and professional. The price was generous. The only issue was the lack of communication regarding a delay in fulfilling and sending the order due to vacation. An automated email response to that end would prove effective and considerate.
Good prices and great service! I am satisfied! Very good job, great that you develop this for people

Review.Titre: I Can't Believe This Is For Real
Review.Contenu: But it is for real! Excellent prices for premium collectibles, with nicely secure payment process and quality packaging. It took a minute to get shipped off, but it got here quickly and in top-notch condition. Very satisfied!

But it is for real! Excellent prices for premium collectibles, with nicely secure payment process and quality packaging. It took a minute to get shipped off, but it got here quickly and in top-notch condition.

Highly satisfied customer since 2012. BFE is my only reliable source for Blurays (and slipcovers) because Cliff ships overseas and packs them securely items always arrive in mint condition. You can request specific items too. Anything movie and physical media related. If you don't find the item you're looking for on the website, just contact Cliff and he will add it to the website so you can order. Fast response too. Reasonable price for items and shipping. He will try his best to fulfill your order. I already have so many Blurays from BFE over the years, even books and movie magazines. I can't thank you enough Cliff. Always appreciate your effort in fulfilling my picky request and orders. To be honest, I feel very grateful that your store exists. You really helped me a lot.Blurays For Everyone never disappoint! Highly recommended!!

Review.Titre: Excellent deterrent against eBay price gougers
Review.Contenu: Superb deals for collector items (physical). Especially when the collector edition (4K/BluRay) item sold out quick in retail stores. Excellent option versus price gouging on eBay. 9/10.I would recommend this company.

Review.Titre: Good service, secure and fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Good service , contacted the seller before making a purchase and he responded very quickly.I bought Frozen II blufans One click a very impressive set.Fast and secure shipping ! Box was mint condition no Mark's or anything absolutely  perfect!

Review.Titre: This is an awesome site with fair…
Review.Contenu: This is an awesome site with fair prices! I needed a refund and he issued it immediately. But then I ordered again and shipment was quick. Highly recommend

Used blurays for everyone for a couple of 4k discs that were getting tricky to get hold of in the UK. Placed my order, got an automated 'thanks for your order' email and then that was it for about a week and a half. Finally got the despatch note and was able to track my parcel every step of its journey. Finally arrived in the UK roughly 2 weeks later. Items were in perfect condition and exactly what I'd ordered. Can't say a bad thing about the whole experience to be honest. Would definitely use again.

Review.Titre: A very good website for blu ray collectors
Review.Contenu: A very good website for collectors all over the world, but do keep in mind if you order outside of the USA you have to pay for import fees. And from anyone who is from the Netherlands and questioned if this site is legit, yes it sure is. Will definitely order again.

Review.Titre: A decnt place for blu-rays and rare slipcovers
Review.Contenu: In October 2021, I had purchased some rare slipcovers and the experience was good. As others have said, it took a while for the seller to ship them out (I believe I waited at least two weeks before they shipped). But in the end, I received my slipcovers in the described conditions. I'd shop there again.

The site was very easy to navigate and find exactly what I was looking for. My order was packaged well and came in perfect condition. My experience was so good that I recently ordered again! BFE is truly a gem in the physical media community. Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: 100% great experiences since 2018 - friendly and supportive seller!
Review.Contenu: Very happy with my purchases at BFE since 2018. I used to purchase very regularly over a long period of time and it was always wonderful - customs friendly, safe and secure packaging and fair prices on the many exclusive items. All sold items are genuine, either in brand new or used condition.But above all, it’s the contact with Cliff that makes the experience great. Any issue (of which there were barely any in my case) can be sorted out and he’s always open to take a look into specific requests, such as slip covers and items not listed on the website. He answers very fast, too! In short, he’s a perfect contact for collectors.I try to come back as much as I can and support a retailer like BFE over Amazon. I wish we had someone like Cliff / BFE in Germany, which is why I ordered so much.Buy with confidence!

Review.Titre: Thank you so much for responding to me
Review.Contenu: Thank you so much for responding to me, I sent you an email as well the other day, so happy you are still in business and if I wanted to make a purchase while the site is down, how could I go about that. Thank you sir.
fast checkout, bought a pre-order item. release date in 1 week, so far 5 star for PRICE (much cheaper than other sites) and ease of checkout,  will see if I get my code next week

I have been ordering from BFE for a couple of years now, the products are competitive with other outlets, the service is superb.The items are always well packaged, hence no damaged to the items on delivery, even slipcovers are well protected.There are OOP items which cost can be reasonable to extreme but the supply is there which other outlets don't.I highly recommend BFE for the quality of the items, packaging, shipping cost and marvelous communication.

Review.Titre: the ease to manoeuvre on the website
Review.Contenu: the ease to manoeuvre on the website, the upgrade to the website helps a lot!.the upgrade is very professional it was a dream to place items in cart, and paypal a dream to go through checkout!
Got my replacement Doctor Who Series 5 Blu Ray case in perfect condition! Great place to get new slipcovers, cases and quality tv shows and films

Review.Titre: Delivers exactly what I want every…
Review.Contenu: Delivers exactly what I want every time. Shipping seems to have improved and I'm now getting my steelbooks faster than before! Thanks!

Review.Titre: At first I was hesitant to buy from BFE…
Review.Contenu: At first I was hesitant to buy from BFE as the website seemed a bit sketchy, and the majority of the reviews were negative. Still, I decided to try my luck, because the blu ray I was looking for wasn't available anywhere else - and I haven't regretted it in the end. The owner came back to me quickly, processed the order, there weren't any hiccups (it was a long journey from the US to Ukraine.... ), still, it arrived even earlier than estimated (I even had to pay at my postal office because I didn't pick it up in time, because the delivery time was so fast) - the casing and everything was very well packed; you could see that the person working on it cared. Yes, if you compare prices - BFE might be more expensive, but I think it's worth it, and I wouldn't give a second thought before buying again.
Excellent service providing slip covers for DVD's and Blu-ray's. I wish it was easier to get these after the fact but luckily Cliff at Bluraysforeveryone has me covered!

Review.Titre: I found an item on BFE that was sold out everywhere else
Review.Contenu: I found an item on BFE that was sold out on all other sites. I didn't want to pay ridiculous eBay prices and it was really reasonable here. I had some questions about the item and with quick responses, it was resolved rapidly. The item came wrapped very well and in a box. No complaints at all.

Order number 37937I'm in the U.K.A great bespoke 'white glove' service for rare limited editions, out of production titles and editions that are internal to the USA only and hard-to-find slipcovers etc..Yes BFEO prices can be slightly higher than retail prices however that is the business economics of supply & demand of rarities and that they have to pay the retail price eg BestBuy and add their costs on top and it's a bespoke service but this is offset in other ways.This latest order as with previous orders has been really well packed. The shipping method of 'spaces' can be slightly confusing but always found BFEO accommodating in resolving.Always found BFEO easy to contact and quick to reply. You also get shipping notifications etc.. Any human mistakes are quickly rectified.Some things are out of their control such as USPS delays. Freight traffic was slower during the pandemic as less cargo space due to PPE shipments and less passenger planes flying with freight/post in the hold.I have recommended BFEO to others outside of the USA who have also been looking for a rare US item with them being pleased too and will continue to do so.Highly recommended.
Steelbook was shipped very quickly and packaged extremely well. Website was easy to navigate. No complaints. Would use again!

Good selection. Person that answers emails was kind of rude, but the issue was on my part. Make sure to read the title and fine print really well. I ordered a movie and don’t pay attention to the pre order part.
